short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) need dual threat soft body armour  for foundational and professional criminology training, to cover security and law office uniforms. Vests need to be fitted to specific body shapes.
description: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement for individually fitted and issued dual threat soft body armour. This armour, worn over uniforms, is required by Correctional Officers (CO), Primary Workers (PW), and Correctional Training Instructors while conducting their daily duties. The period of the Standing Offer will be for one (1) year and four (4) additional option years.  To be delivered to Laval Quebec.

**Government of Canada**
**Tender Notice**

### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

# 21170-231084 WS4096186317-Doc4097878997

**Title:** Gilets pare-balles pour l'approvisionnement en force correctionnelle

**Competition Type:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Solicitation Number:** WS4096186317
**Date of Publication:** July 19, 2023
**Closing Date:** October 27, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Time

## Contract Details

* Contract Start Date: October 9, 2023
* Contract End Date: October 9, 2024
* Estimated Contract Value: Not Available
* Procurement Category: Goods
* UN/CEFACT Codes:
	+ UNSPSC Code: 53100000
	+ UNSPSC Description: Clothing
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, India-Canada CEPA, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Delivery Regions: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (SCC) invites suppliers to submit a bid for the supply of individual Body Armor vests, to be issued to Correctional Officers (CO) and Primary Worker throughout the Province of Quebec excluding the National Capital Region for a period of 1 year, plus up to 4 additional option years, with delivery being Laval, Quebec.

The objective of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is to establish a Standing Offer agreement with the successful Bidder to supply the required quantity and types of individual Body Armor vest, for issuance to Correctional Officers (CO), Primary Workers (PW) and Correctional Training Instructors, to be worn on duty throughout the Province of Quebec, during their daily activities.

### Eligibility and Procedures

Eligible bidders may obtain further information from the contract provider's website.

### Closing Date and Time

October 27, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Time.

Enquiries: Ms. Manon Swanson (elle-la / she-her), Swanson.Manon@TPSG
